DESCRIPTION: Use the command `sdaily`to claim your daily reward. Maintain a streak and get even better rewards!
NOTE:
⚠️ Discord, as well as Sofi Staff will **__never__** do the following:
- Ask you for your `Password` or `One-Time-Password`
- Advise you to change your E-Mail
- Use third-party methods, such as "`Mee6` or `Dyno` to communicate with you.

Any suspicious activity regarding the above mentioned should be immidately reported at {{link}}! ⚠️
